snippet: The suicide of a Mississippi Tea Party founder who was charged in a plot to photograph Senator Thad Cochran’s ailing wife has deepened the enmity left by a divisive Republican primary.
abstract: Suicide of Mark Mayfield, Mississippi Tea Party founder, has deepened enmity left by the divisive primary runoff between Sen Thad Cochran and State Sen Chris McDaniel; Mayfield, a lawyer, was charged along with three others in conspiracy to break into private nursing home and photograph Cochran's wife, Rose, who has long suffered from dementia.
lead_paragraph: The suicide of a Mississippi Tea Party founder who was charged in a plot to photograph Senator Thad Cochran’s ailing wife has deepened the enmity left by a divisive Republican primary.

headline.seo: Mark Mayfield, a Tea Party Founder, Became the Unlikely Focus of a Big Controversy
headline.main: Dirty Tricks, Tea Party Suicide and Rising Mississippi Anger
headline.print_headline: Dirty Tricks, Tea Party Suicide and Rising Mississippi Anger
